bibl.title: Three Demotic Papyri in the Brooklyn Museum. A Contribution to the Study of Contracts and their Instruments in Ptolemaic Egypt.
bibl.seg: Pierce Richard Holton, Three Demotic Papyri in the Brooklyn Museum. A Contribution to the Study of Contracts and their Instruments in Ptolemaic Egypt. (Symbolae Osloenses. Fasc. supplet. XXIV.)
Oslo, Universitetsforlaget, 1972, 8Â°, 232 pp. et VI pll.

C.R. par Bernard Boyaval, REG 88 (1975) p. 357. - Bernadette Menu, Gnomon 47 (1975) pp. 629-632. - Zola M. Packman, BASP 10 (1973) pp. 101-102. - Jan Quaegebeur, ChrEg 49 (1974) No. 98, pp. 288-291. - Jacques Schwartz, RHPhR 53 (1973) p. 442. - W. J. Tait, JEA 60 (1974) pp. 297-298. - J. David Thomas, CR N.S., 24 (1974) pp. 314-315.
